chunks.name: intro-welcome
chunks.text: Welcome to an exciting preview of your enhanced 2025 employee benefits package.

chunks.name: intro-feedback
chunks.text: This year, we've listened to your feedback and created a comprehensive benefits program that truly supports you and your family.

chunks.name: intro-investing
chunks.text: With increased coverage, significant cost savings, and new wellness initiatives, we're investing in what matters most - you.

chunks.name: dates-intro
chunks.text: Let's review the important dates for your 2025 benefits.

chunks.name: dates-january
chunks.text: Starting January first, your enhanced medical, dental, and vision coverage begins - with a fifteen percent reduction in premiums.

chunks.name: dates-march
chunks.text: On March first, our new wellness program launches, along with an increased H-S-A match of up to three thousand dollars.

chunks.name: dates-december
chunks.text: Remember, December thirty-first is when your coverage period ends, with automatic renewal available for your convenience.

chunks.name: benefits-intro
chunks.text: Now, let's explore the game-changing benefits we're introducing for 2025.

chunks.name: benefits-support
chunks.text: You'll have access to twenty-four seven mental health support, zero-dollar telemedicine visits, and comprehensive wellness rewards worth up to twelve hundred dollars.

chunks.name: benefits-hsa
chunks.text: We've doubled our H-S-A contribution to three thousand dollars, and introduced industry-leading fertility and family planning coverage.

chunks.name: benefits-cta
chunks.text: Visit benefits dot company dot com to start your enrollment today. Your future is our investment.
